What a Mess!

Sep 13, 2018

Mirroring my Micro.blog site created some unexpected results. My rillonline.github.io site was entirely replaced to look identical to rill.micro.blog. I had a few bad moments with git and lots of emails from github, but I think this will be all right in the end.

Follow @Rill on Micro.blog.
